title: Massive, Comfortable Beds and Helpful Staff!
text:
The hotel is a small distance from the tourist spots, which we found a benefit more than a restriction. With a metro costing only â‚¬1.50 we were a quick ride away from everything we wanted. The area is nice and quiet with a small walk to local shops and cafes.
The hotel is clean, neat and well looked after. I would describe the decor as traditional with some edge. There is a lounge area with a bar next to the front desk and a (very small) lift available up to the rooms. The bar was unattended most of the time, with us having to request the reception staff to call the barman when we wanted a drink. This wasn't much of a problem however as we spend most of our time out when we wanted a drink.
We were in room 405. The rooms are cosy - they aren't the biggest I've been in. However, what the room lacks in space, it makes up in the size of the bed. I could roll over three times and still have space to stretch out next to my husband.
The facilities in the room were good - a very pleasant shower with a strong steam.
The reception staff were professional and helpful, arranging airport transfers and printing boarding passes etc. with a lot of efficiency.
We enjoyed our stay and would stay again.
